column5: Enjoy your stay at this luxury house : 04 bedrooms, 3 Bathroom, Living Room, Dining Room, Seating Area, Breakfast area , Game Room (with BAR) and Office This beautiful house in located in very quiet neighborhood, nearly removed and fully equipped for all the comfort you deserve . The house is near to White Rock Lake and Arboretum in the lovely neighborhood in Dallas. You can enjoy the game room with a pool table/ping pong table and an entertainment area with Xbox 360.
column8: East Dallas near White Rock Lake
